meanings.definition: A type of tight-fitting trousers worn by women in South Asia.
meanings.sent1: She wore elegant churidars to the wedding.
meanings.sent2: In South Asia, many women prefer wearing churidars for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The churidars seemed to dance along with her as she walked.
meanings.sent4: Her churidars were like second skin, emphasizing every movement.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of her churidars brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: The plural form of churidar, referring to multiple pairs of the garment.
meanings.sent1: She bought three new churidars for the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent2: The boutique displayed a variety of churidars in different colors.
meanings.sent3: Her closet was overflowing with colorful churidars.
meanings.sent4: The churidars hanging on the line fluttered in the breeze like flags.
meanings.sent5: The churidars neatly folded in her drawer awaited their turn to be worn.
